message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.MS 

The paper presents a method for automatic segmentation of liver and lesions in CT images using fully convolutional neural networks and conditional random fields. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of deep learning models for segmentation also suggests the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. The application of the method to medical imaging data may also place it under the multimedia (cs.MM) and medical imaging (cs.MS) sub-categories.
